Posts.Content: Thank you Bustysusy. Have just had a little tomato soup and actually enjoyed it. X
Posts.Title: Eating during FEC first week

Posts.Content: Hi. First time on here. Started FEC on Monday, so day 5 now. Despite being told I would have first 3 days of feeling ‘invincible’ have felt pretty lousy, but today a very little bit better. Couldn’t eat until yesterday and have had little bit of rice pud, piece of banana and 2 slices of toast over the last 2 days. Any suggestions please, as I know I should be eating something, but just don’t really know what I fancy, or would fancy. Sounds stupid, I know, but guess there are lots of you who have had the same.
Posts.Title: Eating during FEC first week

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply. X
